thread.section_title: Photomast Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Photomast | www.photomast.com
thread.title: Hans

author: Hans
title: Hans
text: Have just received the 10 m version of the Photomast, after long deliberation. While an expensive product, the alternative was a drone. Cost-wise they came out about the same, but the photomast is low-tech and allows use of our standard camera. We are very happy about our choice - this is a very high quality product. The relatively low weight means it is portable enough to be carried strapped onto a rucksack. A bit heavier than randonee skis. Our main use will be taking pictures of anchorages for a harbour guide, and hopefully some great summit/cairn photos while "sail & skiing".
